name: Crush The Berries
description:
Crush the Berries is a puzzle game where the player must match 3 berries of the same kind in order to pass stages.

YOUR GOAL:

There are more than one game modes in this game:

Score Targeter – collect the specified number of points

Crush the Jelly – clear the level of jelly

Crush the Block – clear the level of wooden blocks

Dropping the Sugar – drop all sugar chips

Collecting Color – destroy the specified number of chips

The Jam – fill the level with jam


Solve all 37 stages and crush every berry there is!
